CustomField.description: If this field “Disable User Switch in SMS Inbox” field is set to TRUE, that User won't see the Picklist at the top of the SMS Inbox, they'll only be able to view their own messages.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field “Disable User Switch in SMS Inbox” field is set to TRUE, that User won't see the Picklist at the top of the SMS Inbox, they'll only be able to view their own messages.
CustomField.label: Disable User Switch in SMS Inbox
